#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
#define llu long long unsigned

using namespace std;

inline void inp (long long int &n)
{
  n = 0;
  long long int ch = gc();
  int sign = 1;
  while(ch < '0' || ch > '9') {
    if (ch == '-') sign = -1;
    ch = gc();
  }
  while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
    n = (n<<3) + (n<<1) + ch - '0', ch = gc();
  n = n*sign;
}

inline void outp(long long int a)
{
  char snum[25];
  int i=0;
  do
  {
    snum[i++]=a%10+48;
    a=a/10;
  } while(a!=0);
  i=i-1;
  while(i>=0)
    pc(snum[i--]);
  pc('\n');
}

////////////////////////////////

long long int mod_inverse(long long int a,long long int p)
{
    long long int pow=p-2,ans=1;
    while(pow)
    {
        if(pow&1)
        ans=(ans*a)%p;
        a=(a*a)%p;
        //ans=(ans*a)%p;
        pow>>=1;
    }
    return ans;
}

int main()
{
    int i,j,k;
    long long int n,p;
    long long int t;
    inp(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int ans=1;
        inp(n);
        inp(p);
        if(p<=n)
        outp(0);
        else
        {
            //cout << "here" << endl;
            int temp=p-n;
            if(temp==1)
            printf("-1\n");
            else if(temp==2)
            outp(1);
            else
            {
                for(i=2;i<temp;i++)
                {
                    ans=(ans*mod_inverse(p-i,p))%p;
                }
                outp(ans);
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
